scripts.build:prod:linux:darwin: mvn clean install -DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) -Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures) -DskipITs=$(build-env integrationTests.run --not) && pnpm dist
scripts.build:prod:win32: pnpm powershell "mvn clean install `-DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) `-Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures) `-DskipITs=$(build-env integrationTests.run --not)" && pnpm dist
scripts.dist: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && pnpm dist:esj
